home.title: Harshdeep Sharma | Computational Mechanics | Fracture & Fatigue Modeling
home.description: Portfolio and research blog of Harshdeep Sharma, PhD candidate in Computational Mechanics. Specializing in fracture and fatigue in composites using phase-field and cohesive zone models. Interested in LLMs, Computer Vision, Neural Networks, and Transformers for mechanics.

blogs.title: Blog | Harshdeep Sharma - Computational Mechanics & AI
blogs.description: Technical articles and research insights by Harshdeep Sharma on phase-field fracture, cohesive zone models, FEM, AI in mechanics, PINNs, and transformer-based modeling.
